page.title: 06ASIAN CHILD'S DAY/CH.GAMES
page.content:
HAVE{MILK}WHILE MISS READS A BOOK. THEN WE GO FOR DINNER. I GO HOME FOR DINNER. I EAT{CHAPPATI.}THEN I COME BACK TO SCHOOL. AFTER WE HAVE HAD SOME PLAY WE COME IN AND GO TO{HOME BASE. SOMETIMES WE DO GENERAL WORK AND SOMETIMES WE DO SOME OTHER WORK. AFTER SCHOOL I HAVE SOME TEA AND THEN I WASH MY FACE AND READ. I READ TO MY TEACHER AND THEN I LEARN TO READ MORE. {PRAYING}- I PRAY FIVE TIMES A DAY:- 3.30 A.M., 4 P.M., 7 P.M., 8.30 P.M., AND THEN I HAVE DINNER AND I PRAY AT 10.30 P.M. THEN I GO TO SLEEP.
{CHILDREN'S GAMES. {RED ROVER. RED ROVER IS A PLAYGROUND GAME AT OAKHILL PRIMARY SCHOOL. ANY NUMBER OVER FOUR CAN PLAY.THERE HAS TO BE EQUAL SIDES.BOTH SIDES STAND FACING EACH OTHER SOME DISTANCE APART.
